document_data.name: Protection from Spells
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from spells''''' was an [[abjuration]] spell that granted resistance to hostile spells.
document_data.Effects: Subjects benefit from a much greater chance to resist [[spell]]s and magic that functioned like spells, but not natural and supernatural effects.
document_data.Components:
In addition to verbal and somatic components, this spell required a [[diamond]] valued at 500 [[gp]] or more, which was ground to a powder and tossed over the spell recipient(s).

In addition, this spell needed a [[Spell focus|focus]]. Each being to be protected needed to one whole diamond worth 1000 gp while the spell was in effect. If they lost it, the spell ended for them.
